item.title: 9-day winter tour example
item.description: An example of a 9-day ski tour to Svaneti. The tour can be called an extreme holiday, but beginner skiers (snowboarders) will be happy too. Season from December to March Plan 1 (Sat) Arrival in Tbilisi. Excursion program; — Check-in at a hotel in Tbilisi. 2 (Sun) Transfer Tbilisi-Mestia. — Stop for lunch along the way; — Check-in at the Shgedi hotel. 3 (Mon) Skating! Hatsvali resort — Beginners study with instructors; — Experienced people ride on their own; — Evening program.

item.title: Hatsvali and Tetnuldi skiing
item.description: Two ski resorts, Hatsvali and Tetnuldi, are waiting for you. Beginners will enjoy the modern ski lifts and spacious pistes, while experienced skiers will appreciate the challenging freeride options with a vertical drop of 1000 meters. Hatsvali From the hotel window you can see the ski slopes. The ride to the cable car takes 10 minutes. Height 1865 - 2347 meters Height difference: 482 meters Number of tracks: 3 The length of the green, simplest route is 700 m; The length of the blue (longest) route is 2,600 m; The length of the red track is 1,900 m; Lift with cabin.
